lines.text: Women will back my campaign, because no one will point the accusing finger of scandal in my direction. Every woman knows that I've been the perfect gentleman in all... um, almost every woman knows that I've been... um... and in conclusion...
Leroy, you does present a strong argument. Go ahead, but hurry, or I'm going to be un-deputized.
Gee thanks, Chauncey. That's white of you.
